name: Boom Boom Dash
description:
Boom Boom Dash

Boom Boom Dash is a fast-paced platformer where you have to move - or die. Escape the wicked confines of the dungeon using your dash abilities- and your ability to endlessly respawn. There are all sorts of obstacles, from spikes to lasers to even dynamite - but the most dangerous of all is the timer. You only have a few seconds to make it through each level before you explode, so think fast!

Controls: Keyboard
  1.  - WASD/Arrow Keys to move
  2.  - Space to jump (or w/up arrow with tap-jump)
  3.  - W/Up arrow to enter door
  4.  - Z/Either Shift to Dash
  5.  - Q to Self-destruct
  6.  - Esc to pause
Controller
  1.  - Left stick to Move
  2.  - A/B to Jump
  3.  - Up on left stick to enter door
  4.  - X/Y or bumpers to Dash
  5.   Select/Back to self-destruct
  6.   Start to Pause
